Rainy_Day_0: Did you sleep okay? Did the sound of thunder ever wake you up?
Rainy_Day_1: Aren't you cold? I am freezing from the weather. Come cuddle with me!
Rainy_Day_2: Rain, rain go away, come again another day. Little @ wants to play. Rain, rain, go away!$h#$b#Haha. You look so confused! Did you like my singing?$h
Rainy_Day_3: Do you think you can run through the rain? Maybe we should try sometime.
Rainy_Day_4: Today seems to be a good day for reading the book that I borrowed from the library!
patio_Mike: I like taking a break outside and watch over the farm. It is so peaceful.
Rainy_Night_0: Today's a perfect weather for a cup of hot coco before bed, don't you agree?
Rainy_Night_1: Doesn't the rain sound romantic? Maybe it's because I am here with you.
Rainy_Night_2: Honey, you are all wet from the rain! Want me to help dry you off?$u
Rainy_Night_3: Hey, you seem pretty tired today. I just took a shower so the water is still pretty hot.$u
Rainy_Night_4: @! I cooked some dinner as I waited for you.$h#$b#Good work today![197 200 205 206 213]$h
Indoor_Day_0: What a wonderful day! I am going to get some chores done today. So you run along.$l
Indoor_Day_1: @! I got you breakfast! Are your pround of me?$l#$b#Eat it up![194 195 156 210 211]$h
Indoor_Day_2: Sweetheart! Always remember that I love you, okay?$l
Indoor_Day_3: I am going to finish writing my paper today.#$e#It needs to be done by tomorrow and I still have eight pages to write.$s
Indoor_Day_4: Oh, good morning @.#$b#Sorry, I am in a bad mood. The professor rejected my paper! I am frustrated.$a
Indoor_Night_0: You are back! How was your day?#$e#Well, I spent the entire day finishing up my paper. What did you do?
Indoor_Night_1: Wow, you look extra-beautiful tonight. I think my heart is beating too fast.$l
Indoor_Night_2: Have I told you how wonderful of a person you are? I am blessed.$l
Indoor_Night_3: Honey, I got you a present from the city the other day!$h#$b#I thought of you when I saw it.[612 595 533 531 458 74 72 62 60 64 66]$l
Indoor_Night_4: One of the best things I have done in my life is meeting you.$h
Outdoor_0: Ah, what a wonderful day! I feel refreshed!#$e#You have created such a beautiful farm.
Outdoor_1: This place reminds me of when I was a child. I lived in the mountains. Did I tell you that?#$e#Well, I am glad our kids will get to have some fun too!$h
Outdoor_2: You looke more beautiful than ever under this sunlight! Oh wait, the wedding day was pretty amamzing though.$h
Outdoor_3: I just want to run around and gather all this sunlight!$h
Outdoor_4: Are you going to be busy today? Don't push yourself too hard. Take a break! With me!$h
OneKid_0: I still feel like I am dreaming sometimes. I can't believe I am a Dad.$h
OneKid_1: Do you think %kid1 will ever like me more than you? %kid always look for you instead of me.$s
OneKid_3: I can't thank you enough for allowing me to have this wonderful family.$h#$b#...maybe we can have another child...?$u
TwoKids_2: I think %kid2 is a bit more outgoing than %kid1. They are both cute.$h
TwoKids_3: No one will believe that you have two kids! I hope no one tries to ask you out!$a
Good_0: @...! Guess what I got for you from the city!#$b#Hope you like it![612 595 533 531 458 74 72 62 60 64 66]$l
Good_1: You are just perfect the way you are.$l
Good_2: I know I am meant to be with you because every day with you is wonderful.$h
Good_3: I have been changed by you. You made me a better person.$l
Good_4: I just want to cuddle with you forever...$s#$b#What do you mean you don't trust me? I really mean it!$h
Good_5: You mean everything to me, @. You truly are a blessing.$l
Good_6: You make me feel like I am needed in this world. Thank you.$h
Good_7: Hey, @. How are you feeling today? I am feeling like I will miss you a lot today.$u
Good_8: Darling! You are here! I love you more than the peaches!$h#$b#That means I love you more than anything in the world.$l
Good_9: I want to hold you tightly so no one can take you from me!$h
Neutral_0: Hey, @. How have you been doing?
Neutral_1: @, did you see my paper anywhere? I lost one of the pages.
Neutral_2: Nothing much happened today. How are you?
Neutral_3: It seems like we haven't talked in a while. I miss talking to you.$s
Neutral_4: Hey, just remember I am always waiting for you.$s
Neutral_5: Did I do something wrong? Why have you been acting distant recently?$s
Neutral_6: @, tell me what the problem is. We can work it out.
Neutral_7: @, where have you been? I was looking for you.
Neutral_8: Don't you think we need some kind of refreshment in our relationship?
Neutral_9: I sometimes miss the days when we were dating. It was pretty sweet.
Bad_0: The students are asking me if I am dating anyone.#$b#I said 'no'. I mean, I am not dating anyone. Am I?
Bad_1: What have you been doing all day? Don't you think I have the right to know a little bit?$a
Bad_2: I am hoping to finish my report by tomorrow. So please don't bother me.$a
Bad_3: Do you even care about me? Why did you even marry me if you are going to ignore me all day?$a
Bad_4: It has been a while since I laughed. Maybe I will go watch a movie sometime.$s
Bad_5: I feel lonely these days. Do you know why that would be?$s
Bad_6: You are such a selfish person. You never ask me how I have been.$a
Bad_7: You know, I think we need to do something with our marriage. This is not right.
Bad_8: Have you seen Leah today? Can you thank her for me?#$b#Oh, she got me a drink the other night.
funLeave_Mike: I'm going to work today. I wil come back as soon as I can! Love you!$l
funReturn_Mike: It's always great to come back home and see my wonderful family!$h
spring_1: Another year has begun! What a wonderful day!$h
spring_6: Don't you think spring here is beautiful?#$b#Hey, Don't make a pouty face! You are way more beautiful than the flowers.$l#$b#Here, I picked a flower for you this morning.[22]$h
spring_12: Tomorrow's the Egg Festival! Do you think you can beat Abigail this time?
spring_23: Oh... tomorrow's the Flower Dance, isn't it? You are going to look wonderful.$l#$e#Did I tell you that I fell in love with you during the Flower Dance the first year you came to town?
summer_1: It's summer! Oh, it's just going to be great!$h
summer_10: Do you know what you are going to bring for Luau? What about a cauliflower with a golden star? Do we have any left?$h
summer_27: Summer is closing to an end, but fall is coming! Ready for some pumpkins?$h
fall_1: It's fall! Fall always makes me a bit meloncholy...$s#$b#Isn't that true?
fall_15: Tomorrow's the Fair? Will you go with me? I am pretty excited.$h
fall_26: I am craving baked potatoes... I should go and grab something to eat...$s
winter_1: When you get cold, you can always come to me for a hug,$u
winter_7: Are you going to enter the fishing contest tomorrow? I will cheer for you with all my heart!$h
winter_28: You have been such a blessing to me, @! Here's a thank-you gift for being wonderful for an entire year.$h#$b#Do you like it?[612 595 533 531 458 74 72 62 60 64 66]$h#$e#Now, come closer... $l
